languages.text: "Хорошо, я понял. Если не уступлю, мы так и будем стоять тут и препираться". {n}В голосе нет больше ярости, только безграничная усталость.{/n} "Хватит, вы добились своего".
"All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо, я понял. Если не уступлю, мы так и будем стоять тут и препираться". {n}В голосе нет больше ярости, только безграничная усталость.{/n} "Хватит, вы добились своего".

traits.locale_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."
"All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."
"All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."
"All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."
"All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

languages.text: 「わかった。俺が折れなければ、ここで言い争いを続けるだけだ」{n}彼の声にはもはや怒りはなく、あるのは底知れぬ疲労だけだった。{/n}「もういい。好きにしろ」
languages.original_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

traits.locale_text: 「わかった。俺が折れなければ、ここで言い争いを続けるだけだ」{n}彼の声にはもはや怒りはなく、あるのは底知れぬ疲労だけだった。{/n}「もういい。好きにしろ」

languages.text: "Schon gut, ich versteh's ja. Wenn ich nicht nachgebe, stehen wir nur hier rum und streiten." {n}In seiner Stimme liegt kein Zorn mehr, nur noch grenzenlose Müdigkeit.{/n} "Genug jetzt, Ihr habt gewonnen."
languages.original_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

traits.locale_text: "Schon gut, ich versteh's ja. Wenn ich nicht nachgebe, stehen wir nur hier rum und streiten." {n}In seiner Stimme liegt kein Zorn mehr, nur noch grenzenlose Müdigkeit.{/n} "Genug jetzt, Ihr habt gewonnen."

languages.text: « Bon, très bien, j'ai compris. Si je ne renonce pas, nous allons simplement rester là, à nous disputer. » {n}La rage dans sa voix s'est évanouie, cédant la place à une lassitude incommensurable.{/n} « Ça suffit, nous ferons comme il vous plaira. »
languages.original_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

traits.locale_text: « Bon, très bien, j'ai compris. Si je ne renonce pas, nous allons simplement rester là, à nous disputer. » {n}La rage dans sa voix s'est évanouie, cédant la place à une lassitude incommensurable.{/n} « Ça suffit, nous ferons comme il vous plaira. »

languages.text: «Está bien, ya lo pillo. Si no cedo, estaremos todo el día discutiendo». {n}Ya no hay furia en su voz, solo un cansancio infinito.{/n} «Se ha salido usted con la suya».
languages.original_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

traits.locale_text: «Está bien, ya lo pillo. Si no cedo, estaremos todo el día discutiendo». {n}Ya no hay furia en su voz, solo un cansancio infinito.{/n} «Se ha salido usted con la suya».

languages.text: “好吧，我明白了。如果我不肯让步，那我们就只能没完没了地斗嘴了。”{n}他声音中的怒火已经消散，只剩下无尽的疲惫。{/n}“好吧，就按你说的来吧。”
languages.original_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，我明白了。如果我不肯让步，那我们就只能没完没了地斗嘴了。”{n}他声音中的怒火已经消散，只剩下无尽的疲惫。{/n}“好吧，就按你说的来吧。”

languages.text: "Pekâlâ, anlıyorum. Ben vazgeçmediğim sürece burada dikilip ağız dalaşı yapacağız öyleyse." {n}Sesinde artık öfke değil, yalnızca sonsuz bir bezginlik duyuluyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun."
languages.original_text: "All right, I get it. If I don't yield, we'll just stand here and bicker." {n}There was no more rage in his voice, only limitless weariness.{/n} "Enough, you've got your way."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ, anlıyorum. Ben vazgeçmediğim sürece burada dikilip ağız dalaşı yapacağız öyleyse." {n}Sesinde artık öfke değil, yalnızca sonsuz bir bezginlik vardı.{/n} "Yeter, istediğin oldu."
